description:
Change Ieaf256a5c0f54804686318d6cbd5877a5003c9eb made the powervm driver raise NotImplementedError from the plug_vifs method which causes this failure on the compute node when it starts up:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/45241/

Looking at other virt drivers that don't support the plug_vifs method (hyperv and vmware), they simply pass, which is what the powervm driver use to do before that change.

The powervm driver should either revert to pass on plug_vifs or the nova compute manager should catch NotImplementedError from driver.plug_vifs and swallow it here:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/2013.2.b2/nova/compute/manager.py#L638
title: init_host fails due to powervm driver raising NotImplementedError for plug_vifs

Change Ieaf256a5c0f54804686318d6cbd5877a5003c9eb made the powervm driver raise NotImplementedError from the plug_vifs method which causes this failure on the compute node when it starts up:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/45241/

Looking at other virt drivers that don't support the plug_vifs method (hyperv and vmware), they simply pass, which is what the powervm driver use to do before that change.

The powervm driver should either revert to pass on plug_vifs or the nova compute manager should catch NotImplementedError from driver.plug_vifs and swallow it here:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/2013.2.b2/nova/compute/manager.py#L638

comments.content: Here is an example of a patch to the compute manager to catch NotImplementedError when a virt driver raises NotImplementedError for the suspend API.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/43955
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/43955
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/cda106c399a81d4027d3bb99f452fd4064405009
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit cda106c399a81d4027d3bb99f452fd4064405009
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 27 14:45:27 2013 -0700

    powervm: revert driver to pass for plug_vifs
    
    Change Ieaf256a5c0f54804686318d6cbd5877a5003c9eb made the powervm driver
    plug_vifs method raise NotImplementedError rather than pass, which is
    what the hyper-v and vmware drivers do for plug_vifs. This results in
    the compute manager failing to init the host because it's not catching
    NotImplementedError from driver.plug_vifs.
    
    This patch simply changes the powervm driver plug_vifs method back to
    the old behavior (pass), but at least logs a debug message this time.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1217586
    
    Change-Id: Iafe87cbb9b3cf728a47cb9cc43151798fcbb780f
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
